name: file_change
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A file was changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					files:read 				 The file_change event is sent when any property of a file is changed. It is sent to all connected clients for all users that have permission to see the file. The file property is a file object containing information about the file.
